data.title: More Plastic Tubing Manufacturer Listings
data.meta_description: Find a detailed list of the premier plastic tubing turn key manufacturers offering low cost, superior performance, and high quality industrial plastic tubing.
data.text:
Get Your Company Listed

Commercial Industrial Supply

Rock Hill, SC | 866-777-8001

Commercial Industrial Supply (CIS) is a leading supplier of plastic tubing products and services, serving a wide range of industries including agriculture, food and beverage, marine, water treatment, and many more. With over 10 years of experience in the industry, CIS is committed to providing high-quality products and exceptional customer service.
